content: I'm looking to sell a few Kialaras:- [2015] Kialara Labyrint #586 (silver spheres)- [2015] Kialara Labyrint #852 (ceramic spheres)- [2015] Kialara Signature Series – Ricky Allman ‘Excavatorelevator 1’ #192/500- [2015] Kialara Signature Series – Ricky Allman ‘Excavatorelevator 2’ #101/250- [2015] Kialara Signature Series – Julia Tourianski ‘Current’ #101/500Feel free to post or DM offers, can supply pictures if needed.

comments.author: M-BTC
comments.body: Quote from: 123Dave on October 24, 2022, 09:03:18 PMPictures would be greatSure thing! All of them are in great condition. It's worth noting that the front of the Current seems a bit abrazed (due to previous owner). The scratches are really shallow so a quick polish would easily get rid of that.

comments.body: Both Ricky Allman's have been sold.
